      • make_and_viewPage

        int make_and_viewPage(java.io.RandomAccessFile bReader,
                      int startLoc,
                      android.widget.TextView text_holder)
        Creates pages and sends them to the textview object for displaying on the screen Prints a set number of characters at a time
        Parameters:
        bReader - randomaccessfile used to read text from file
        startLoc - Tells the file reader where to start reading from the file
        text_holder - textView object that displays text to the user
        Returns:
        returns the current position of the cursor
